statement.p: In 26.92 of the last 26 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{26}}={0.2692}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{26}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2692}\cdot{26}={6.9992}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 26-6.9992=19.0008 We round that as requested to 19.
